title: Vintage Dexter Medina Golf Shoes Black Wingtip Brogues 11.5D
listperfectly_description:
Vintage Dexter Medina wingtip golf shoes with metal spikes and kiltie fringe in size 11.5D.

Vintage Dexter Medina men's black leather golf shoes with wingtip brogue detailing, stamped leather soles, and metal spikes; Made in USA lace-ups with classic kiltie fringe.

You will receive the following item(s):
- Men's golf shoes (pair)

Measurements:
- Size / Fit: US 11.5 D
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): 12.8 in (32.5 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): 4.5 in (11.4 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): 11.8 in (30 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): 3.9 in (9.9 cm)
- Heel height: 1 in (2.5 cm)
- Platform height (forefoot): 0.3 in (0.8 cm)
- Toe box height: 1.2 in (3 cm)
- Weight (pair): 3.60 lb (1.63 kg)

Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed.
